column4: hi guyz, i just loop scanned my own computer (localhost) with NMAP and found that the "netbios-ssn" port open ...i don't know what that port is used for or what application are meant to run on it, i googled for it but found nothing ... can any one explain to me what application are used by this port and will it be a good idea to close this port
and what port number is that netbios-ssn at?
